product.name: Dog Ramp for Stairs,2pack Dog Stairs Pet Steps with Non-Slip Mat and Anti-Slip Stickers Grippy Carpet Surface for Dog Paws for Any Staircase Pet Ramp for Small Dogs Cats Senior Pets Injured Dogs
product.bullet_points:
• NOTE: Our dog stairs are packed in vacuum compressed packaging, the sponge needs more than 24 hours to rebound, please be sure to open all the packaging before use and wait patiently until it completely returns to its normal shape. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems during use.
• HIGH DENSITY SPONGE,NOT EASILY DEFPRMED -The pet ramp is made of thickened high-density sponge, load-bearing is not easy to deform/collapse, providing stable climbing support for puppies, mobility-impaired dogs and senior dogs.
• DOUBLE NON-SLIP,SAFTY PROTECTION-The surface of the dog ramp has an added non-slip sponge strip design to prevent your dog's paws from slipping and help your puppy to go up the stairs easily; the bottom is made of non-slip nylon, which can be firmly attached to the ground so that your puppy can climb freely. The product also comes with non-slip pads and non-slip stickers for securing our ramp to the stairs to ensure your dog's safety!
• CONFORMS TO STEP GAP FOR EASY CROSSING- Daordaer dog stairs are precisely adapted to the difference in height between the two steps of the home staircase, and can be quickly installed without tools -- directly embedded in the step gap to form a gentle slope, the slope conforms to the mechanical structure of the dog's feet, helping small dogs / short-legged dogs to easily reach the top, and say goodbye to the fear of climbing and the risk of falling due to the high steps.
• THOUGHTFULGUARDING OF PET JOINT HEALTH-Our dog ladder is designed for senior dogs, short-legged dogs or dogs recovering from surgery. The gently sloping structure reduces the impact of jumping on the spine and joints, helps mobility-impaired fur kids to go up and down the stairs on their own, and enhances the degree of freedom of movement in the home.
• CLEAR APPLICATION SCENARIOS-Our dog step size is 15.6x10x7 inches, focusing on solving family stair climbing needs, not recommended for sofas, high beds and other soft or curved surfaces, to ensure the use of safe and worry-free!
features: NOTE: Our dog stairs are packed in vacuum compressed packaging, the sponge needs more than 24 hours to rebound, please be sure to open all the packaging before use and wait patiently until it completely returns to its normal shape. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems during use.

HIGH DENSITY SPONGE,NOT EASILY DEFPRMED -The pet ramp is made of thickened high-density sponge, load-bearing is not easy to deform/collapse, providing stable climbing support for puppies, mobility-impaired dogs and senior dogs.

DOUBLE NON-SLIP,SAFTY PROTECTION-The surface of the dog ramp has an added non-slip sponge strip design to prevent your dog's paws from slipping and help your puppy to go up the stairs easily; the bottom is made of non-slip nylon, which can be firmly attached to the ground so that your puppy can climb freely. The product also comes with non-slip pads and non-slip stickers for securing our ramp to the stairs to ensure your dog's safety!

CONFORMS TO STEP GAP FOR EASY CROSSING- Daordaer dog stairs are precisely adapted to the difference in height between the two steps of the home staircase, and can be quickly installed without tools -- directly embedded in the step gap to form a gentle slope, the slope conforms to the mechanical structure of the dog's feet, helping small dogs / short-legged dogs to easily reach the top, and say goodbye to the fear of climbing and the risk of falling due to the high steps.

THOUGHTFULGUARDING OF PET JOINT HEALTH-Our dog ladder is designed for senior dogs, short-legged dogs or dogs recovering from surgery. The gently sloping structure reduces the impact of jumping on the spine and joints, helps mobility-impaired fur kids to go up and down the stairs on their own, and enhances the degree of freedom of movement in the home.

CLEAR APPLICATION SCENARIOS-Our dog step size is 15.6x10x7 inches, focusing on solving family stair climbing needs, not recommended for sofas, high beds and other soft or curved surfaces, to ensure the use of safe and worry-free!
